text: is the 21st single by Japanese idol girl group Nogizaka46. It was released on 8 August 2018. It reached number-one on the weekly Oricon Singles Chart with 989,000 copies sold. It was also number-one on the Billboard Japan Hot 100. == Release == This single was released in 5 versions. Type-A, Type-B, Type-C, Type-D and a regular edition. ==Track listing== All lyrics written by Yasushi Akimoto. === Type-A === === Type-B === === Type-C === === Type-D === === Regular Edition === == Participating members == === "Jikochū de Ikō!" === *Center: Asuka Saitō ==Chart performance== ===Oricon=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! style="text-align:center;"|Chart ! style="text-align:center;"|Peak ! style="text-align:center;"|Debut Sales ! style="text-align:center;"|Sales Total |- |align="left"|Weekly Singles Chart | style="text-align:center;"| 1 | style="text-align:center;"| 989,000 | style="text-align:center;"| 1,061,000 |} ===Billboard Japan=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! style="text- align:center;"|Chart ! style="text-align:center;"|Peak |- |align="left"|Japan Hot 100 | style="text-align:center;"|1 |} ===Year-end charts=== {|class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2018) ! scope="col"| Position |- |Japan (Japan Hot 100) | style="text-align:center;"|7 |} ==References== Category:2018 singles Category:2018 songs Category:Japanese-language songs Category:Nogizaka46 songs Category:Oricon Weekly number-one singles Category:Billboard Japan Hot 100 number-one singles Category:Song articles with missing songwriters
